limmen.controllers

Class CustomerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • limmen.controllers.CustomerController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/resources/customers")
public class CustomerController
extends java.lang.Object
    RestController for the resource pointed by the url: /resources/customers*
    Author:
    Kim Hammar on 2016-03-22.
